name: Space Junk (itch) (SelfMadeGames)
description:
Mechanics include walking, jumping, interacting and shooting. Using a unique weapon called The Suck Cannon, the player must suck up items in the environment, considered 'space junk' to use as ammunition to combat hostile invaders. The player can also use another weapon called The Gravity Gun to collect junk that is otherwise out of reach.

THEMES I AM FOCUSING ON

  • Game Design
  • Level Design
  • Programming

CONTROLS  [PC]

  • Use W, A, S, and D to move
  • Press 'E' to interact
  • Press 'ESC' to pause the game
  • Press 'Spacebar' to jump 
  • MB1 to fire
  • MB2 to suck
  • Scrollwheel to switch weapons

CONTROLS  [Xbox/PS4]

  • Use the Right stick to aim
  • Use the Left stick to move
  • Press 'X' or 'Circle' to interact
  • Press 'Start' to pause the game
  • Press 'A' or 'X' to jump 
  • Right trigger to fire
  • Left trigger to suck
  • Press 'Y' or 'Triangle' to switch weapons

THINGS TO NOTE/BUGS

  • Currently, the player cannot die
  • There is no 'End' or 'Victory' State
  • Crosshair state issue
  • Framerate issue
